string.name: desc
string.value: They are quiet and gentle in nature, so they don't go craving for food too often. They don't seem to be too obedient of their owners.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little kitty, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: name
string.value: Brown Kitty

string.name: name
string.value: Brown Puppy

string.name: desc
string.value: They are outgoing and active in nature, so they can't sit still for a period of time, which makes them hungry often. They are very obedient of their owners.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little puppy, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: name
string.value: Pink Bunny

string.name: desc
string.value: They are well-behaved and quiet, so they don't need to be fed more than the usual amount. They are smart and obedient, but also stubborn.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little bunny, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: name
string.value: Mini Kargo

string.name: desc
string.value: They are very very active, so they get hungry pretty often. Very intelligent, they are quite obedient of their owners.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little Mini Kargo, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: name
string.value: Black Kitty

string.name: desc
string.value: They are quiet and gentle in nature, so they don't go craving for food too often. They don't seem to be too obedient of their owners.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little kitty, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: name
string.value: White Bunny

string.name: desc
string.value: They are well-behaved and quiet, so they don't need to be fed more than the usual amount. They are smart and obedient, but also stubborn.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little bunny, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: desc
string.value: Active, yet calm at times. Can be moderately fed. Very smart in general.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little Huskey, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: name
string.value: Black Pig

string.name: desc
string.value: Very active and hungry at all times. Need to be fed often. Very friendly in nature, so it's easy to increase the level of closeness with it.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little black pig, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: desc
string.value: Calm, relaxed, and gentle. A very rare creature.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little panda, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: name
string.value: Dino Boy

string.name: desc
string.value: A very adorable male baby dinosaur that is both active and unpredictable.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little Dino Boy, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: name
string.value: Dino Girl

string.name: desc
string.value: A very adorable female baby dinosaur that is both active and unpredictable.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little Dino Girl, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: desc
string.value: The always-curious monkey never rests, wanders around.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little monkey, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: name
string.value: White Tiger

string.name: desc
string.value: They are very gentle and obedient in nature, easily becoming friendly with the owner, which in turn speeds up the level-up process.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little white tiger, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: desc
string.value: Very outgoing and mature; doesn't need to be fed all the time. An intelligent pet that easily understands the commands from the master.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little Elephant, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: desc
string.value: Every Christmas, Santa Claus rides on the sleigh driven by his trusty sidekick, Rudolph.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little red-nosed Rudolph, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: desc
string.value: They are smart and obedient by nature, picking up commands faster than other pets, but they also can get hungry in a hurry.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little Rudolph, but the "Water of Life" has completely dried up, turning it back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: desc
string.value: A hyper-active robot that always changes its mind on everything. Very unpredictable, yet easy to please.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little robot, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: desc
string.value: Active, yet calm at times. Can be moderately fed. Very smart in general.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little Huskey, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: name
string.value: Mini Yeti

string.name: desc
string.value: A trustworthy pet that quietly watches everyone's back. Quiet, but smart and gets a lot of things done.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little Mini Yeti, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: desc
string.value: Very charming who is also very intuitive, but not as obedient as some of the others

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little Monkey, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: desc
string.value: Somewhat active, quiet and not well-behaved in nature. It is not very obedient, but isn't hungry very often.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little Turkey, but the "Water of Life" has completely dried up, turning it back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: desc
string.value: Penguins are always energetic and in good spirits. Use the Meso Magnet and Item Pouch on the Penguin to pick up the mesos and items on the ground.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little Penguin, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: name
string.value: Jr. Balrog

string.name: desc
string.value: A trustworthy pet who is equally quick-witted. Unlike its masculine appearance, it is prone to insecurity and shyness.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little Jr. Balrog, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: name
string.value: Golden Pig

string.name: desc
string.value: This designed Golden Pig will definately bring you a Good Luck! Use the Meso Magnet and Item Pouch to pick up the mesos and items on the ground.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little Golden Pig, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: name
string.value: Sun Wu Kong

string.name: desc
string.value: Sun Wu Kong ran out of Tang Shan Zhang. He is lazy and moody but can be changed with love.

string.name: descD
string.value: Sun Wu Kong used to be cute but now he went back to doll as water of life dried out. Special magic can give him a life again.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special egg that becomes a mythical Baby Dragon upon hatching.

string.name: name
string.value: Baby Dragon

string.name: desc
string.value: A Baby Dragon hatched out of the special Dragon Egg. At Level 15, the pet can be evolved into a full-fledged Adult Dragon with the help of Garnox the NPC using the Rock of Evolution.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute baby dragon, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life, however...

string.name: name
string.value: Green Dragon

string.name: desc
string.value: Mysterious magical powers aligned and sucessfully evolved the Baby Dragon into a Green Dragon!

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cool Green Dragon, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life, however...

string.name: name
string.value: Red Dragon

string.name: desc
string.value: Mysterious magical powers aligned and sucessfully evolved the Baby Dragon into a Red Dragon!

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cool Red Dragon, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life, however...

string.name: name
string.value: Blue Dragon

string.name: desc
string.value: Mysterious magical powers aligned and sucessfully evolved the Baby Dragon into a Blue Dragon!

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cool Blue Dragon, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life, however...

string.name: name
string.value: Black Dragon

string.name: desc
string.value: Mysterious magical powers aligned and sucessfully evolved the Baby Dragon into the rare and majestic Black Dragon!

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a magnificent Black Dragon, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life, however...

string.name: name
string.value: Black Bunny

string.name: desc
string.value: They are well-behaved and quiet, so they don't need to be fed more than the usual amount. They are smart and obedient, but also stubborn.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little bunny, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: name
string.value: Jr. Reaper

string.name: desc
string.value: Miniature death incarnate. Makes for a loyal but cheeky sidekick that is prone to talking back.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little Jr. Reaper, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: desc
string.value: Active, yet calm at times. Can be moderately fed. Very smart in general.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little Huskey, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: name
string.value: White Monkey

string.name: desc
string.value: The always-cute White Monkey loves a watermelon. However, he sometimes turns into an angry Mama Monkey.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute White Monkey, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life, however...

string.name: desc
string.value: A small, furry creature with very, very sharp spikes. A lovable pet.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little porcupine, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: name
string.value: 주니어 리퍼

string.name: desc
string.value: 할로윈 데이에 태어난 귀여운 아기사신입니다. 영혼을 거두어가는 무서운 존재이지만, 친구가 될 수만 있다면 이보다 신비로운 존재는 없을 것입니다. \n#c스킬: 메소 줍기, 아이템 줍기, 소유권 없는 아이템&메소 줍기, 자동 줍기, 이동반경 확대, MP 물약충전#

string.name: descD
string.value: 귀여운 주니어 리퍼이었지만 생명의 물이 모두 말라서 인형의 형태로 돌아갔습니다. 특정한 마법으로 다시 생명을 불어넣어 줄 수 있습니다.

string.name: desc
string.value: An adorable Snowman that is also very active. May seem a little rude at times, but the more it is loved, the more affable it becomes.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little snowman, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: desc
string.value: A happy-go-lucky, orange mushroom that loves shiny stones.

string.name: descD
string.value: A formerly adorable orange mushroom that turned into an inanimate doll due to severe dehydration from Life Water. Breathe new life into the doll using a special kind of magic!

string.name: name
string.value: 고슴도치

string.name: desc
string.value: 상당히 까칠하고, 싫고 좋음이 분명한 고슴도치입니다. 하지만 말을 잘 들어보면, 주인을 너무나 좋아하는 마음이 담겨 있습니다. \n#c스킬: 메소줍기, 아이템줍기#

string.name: descD
string.value: 귀여운 고슴도치이었지만 생명의 물이 모두 말라서 인형의 형태로 돌아갔습니다. 특정한 마법으로 다시 생명을 불어넣어 줄 수 있습니다.

string.name: name
string.value: Orange Tiger

string.name: desc
string.value: They are very gentle and obedient in nature, easily becoming friendly with the owner, which in turn speeds up the level-up process.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little white tiger, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: desc
string.value: Calm and quiet by nature, the easy-going, eccentric Skunk has a rather humorous and pompous outlook on life, the finer things are what it enjoys.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little skunk, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: name
string.value: 키노

string.name: desc
string.value: 반짝이는 돌을 아주 좋아하는 활발하고 명랑한 주황버섯입니다. \n#c스킬:메소줍기, 아이템줍기#

string.name: descD
string.value: 귀여운 주황버섯이었지만 생명의 물이 모두 말라서 인형의 형태로 돌아갔습니다. 특정한 마법으로 다시 생명을 불어넣어 줄 수 있습니다.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special egg that becomes a mythical Robo upon hatching.

string.name: name
string.value: Baby Robo

string.name: desc
string.value: A Baby Robo hatched out of the special Capsule. At Level 15, the pet can be evolved into a full-fledged Adult Robo with the help of Garnox the NPC using the Rock of Evolution.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute baby robo, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life, however...

string.name: name
string.value: Blue Robo

string.name: desc
string.value: Mysterious magical powers aligned and sucessfully evolved the Baby Robo into a Blue Robo!

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cool Blue Robo, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life, however...

string.name: name
string.value: Red Robo

string.name: desc
string.value: Mysterious magical powers aligned and sucessfully evolved the Baby Robo into a Red Robo!

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cool Red Robo, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life, however...

string.name: name
string.value: Green Robo

string.name: desc
string.value: Mysterious magical powers aligned and sucessfully evolved the Baby Robo into a Green Robo!

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cool Green Robo, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life, however...

string.name: name
string.value: Gold Robo

string.name: desc
string.value: Mysterious magical powers aligned and sucessfully evolved the Baby Robo into a Gold Robo!

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cool Gold Robo, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life, however...

string.name: name
string.value: Gorilla Robo

string.name: desc
string.value: Mysterious magical powers aligned and sucessfully evolved the Baby Robo into the rare and majestic Gorilla Robo!

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a magnificent Gorilla Robo, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life, however...

string.name: desc
string.value: Snail that is really hard to figure out.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little Snail, but the magic has run out, and it turned back into a doll. Unfortunately, there's no way to revive this pet. Double-click on the doll to find out how to find a new pet.

string.name: desc
string.value: The star of this year's Holidays. Projects an aura of nobility and gentleness. Only available during the winter Holidays!

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a magnificent Crystal Rudolph, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life, however...

string.name: desc
string.value: A trustworthy pet who is equally quick-witted. Unlike its masculine appearance, it is prone to insecurity and shyness.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute Toucan, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life, however...

string.name: name
string.value: White Duck

string.name: desc
string.value: Silly and foolish, but hard working and easy-going by nature, White Duck is easy to please, and enjoys good food and a swim.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a magnificent White Duck, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life, however...

string.name: name
string.value: Pink Bean

string.name: desc
string.value: A short and chubby pet summoned through the Goddess' mirror. It is temperamental.\n#cA pet whose life will never expire.#

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: name
string.value: Baby Tiger

string.name: desc
string.value: Baby Tiger, the big star of 2010.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a magnificent Baby Tiger, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life, however...

string.name: name
string.value: Weird Alien

string.name: desc
string.value: A strange alien that crash landed in the Maple World. It can't speak, but it is affectionate and deeply curious.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a strange alien, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life, however...

string.name: desc
string.value: Mir, a cute baby dragon that has just hatched from a dragon's egg.

string.name: descD
string.value: Mir, who has turned into a doll because the Water of Life has dried up.

string.name: desc
string.value: Ruby, a cute baby dragon that has just hatched from a dragon's egg.

string.name: descD
string.value: Ruby, who has turned into a doll because the Water of Life has dried up.

string.name: name
string.value: Bing Monkey

string.name: desc
string.value: A research monkey that helps Dr. Bing with his experiments...by posing as the test subject! This little monkey wears a suit as protection from the atmosphere.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a Visitor Research Monkey but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life, however...

string.name: name
string.value: Corgi Pup

string.name: desc
string.value: A playful and active Welsh Corgi.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your lovely Welsh Corgi has turned into a doll. You can revive it with Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: The always-curious monkey never rests, wanders around.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little monkey, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: name
string.value: Black Kitty

string.name: desc
string.value: They are quiet and gentle in nature, so they don't go craving for food too often. They don't seem to be too obedient of their owners.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little kitty, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: desc
string.value: Penguins are always energetic and in good spirits. Use the Meso Magnet and Item Pouch on the Penguin to pick up the mesos and items on the ground.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little Penguin, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: name
string.value: Baby Tiger

string.name: desc
string.value: Baby Tiger, the big star of 2010.

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: name
string.value: Persian Cat

string.name: desc
string.value: An elegant and prim Persian Cat.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your lovely Persian Cat has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Esel is a mysterious unicorn looking for the right companion.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your lovely unicorn, Esel, has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious cake, baked to celebrate MapleStory's Anniversary!

string.name: descD
string.value: A cake doll that was once alive. The "Water of Life" which sustained it has dried up.

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious pie, baked to celebrate MapleStory's Anniversary!

string.name: descD
string.value: A pie doll that was once alive. The "Water of Life" which sustained it has dried up.

string.name: name
string.value: Black Bunny

string.name: desc
string.value: A black rabbit. Kind of rude and enjoys lecturing its owner.\n#cSkills: Meso Magnet#

string.name: descD
string.value: Your black rabbit has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Black Bunny

string.name: desc
string.value: A black rabbit. Kind of rude and enjoys lecturing its owner.\n#cSkills: Meso Magnet#

string.name: descD
string.value: Your black rabbit has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Tiel is an elegant unicorn that is looking for a good friend!

string.name: descD
string.value: Your elegant unicorn, Tiel, has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Galiel is a sweet unicorn always ready for fun!

string.name: descD
string.value: Your lovely unicorn, Galiel, has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Esel is a mysterious unicorn looking for the right companion.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your lovely unicorn, Esel, has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Tiel is an elegant Unicorn, waiting for a good friend along with Esel.\n#cSkills: Meso Magnet, Item Pouch #

string.name: descD
string.value: Your elegant unicorn, Tiel, has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Galiel is a lovely Unicorn who enjoys frolicking with Esel and Tiel.\n#cSkills: Meso Magnet, Item Pouch #

string.name: descD
string.value: Your lovely unicorn, Galiel, has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Pink Bean

string.name: desc
string.value: Behold, the cute and talented Pink Bean! There are many secrets beneath its adorable surface... \n#cSkills: Auto Buff, Meso Magnet, Item Pouch #

string.name: descD
string.value: Your cute Pink Bean has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Corgi Pup

string.name: desc
string.value: The spunky little Corgi Pup! It sure loves that Blue Birdy. \n#cSkills: Auto Buff, Meso Magnet, Item Pouch#

string.name: descD
string.value: Your energetic Corgi Pup has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Black Pig

string.name: desc
string.value: Very active and hungry at all times. Need to be fed often. Very friendly in nature, so it's easy to increase the level of closeness with it.

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious cake, baked to celebrate MapleStory's Anniversary!

string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious pie, baked to celebrate MapleStory's Anniversary!

string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.value: Corgi Pup

string.name: desc
string.value: A playful and active Welsh Corgi.

string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.value: Persian Cat

string.name: desc
string.value: An elegant and prim Persian Cat.

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: name
string.value: Jr. Reaper

string.name: desc
string.value: Miniature death incarnate. Makes for a loyal but cheeky sidekick that is prone to talking back.

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: name
string.value: White Bunny

string.name: desc
string.value: They are well-behaved and quiet, so they don't need to be fed more than the usual amount. They are smart and obedient, but also stubborn.

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: desc
string.value: Mir, a cute baby dragon that has just hatched from a dragon's egg.

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: desc
string.value: Tiel is an elegant unicorn that is looking for a good friend! \n#cSkills: Meso Magnet, Item Pouch #

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: desc
string.value: Esel is a mysterious unicorn looking for the right companion. \n#cSkills: Meso Magnet, Item Pouch #

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: desc
string.value: Galiel is a sweet unicorn always ready for fun! \n#cSkills: Meso Magnet, Item Pouch #

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: desc
string.value: Craw is a chatty parrot who keeps watch from the crow's nest of pirate ships.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your chatty parrot, Craw, has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Adriano is a surly pirate otter of few words.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your taciturn otter, Adriano, has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Bonkey the gorilla acts as helmsman and powder monkey aboard a pirate ship.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your reliable powder monkey/gorilla, Bonkey, has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Storm Dragon

string.name: desc
string.value: A great and regal dragon who carries the legendary Dragon Orb.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your Storm Dragon has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Metus, a mischievous demon who preys on fear.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your mischievous demon has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Mos, a melancholy demon who controls death.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your melancholy demon has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Invidia, a tomboy demon who revels in jealousy.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your jealous demon has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Fennec Fox

string.name: desc
string.value: A romantic little Fennec Fox that claims to have come from Planet B612. \n#cSkills: Auto Buff, Meso Magnet, Item Pouch#

string.name: descD
string.value: Your Fennec Fox has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Corgi Pup

string.name: desc
string.value: The spunky little Corgi Pup! It sure loves that Blue Birdy. \n#cSkills: Auto Buff, Meso Magnet, Item Pouch#

string.name: descD
string.value: Your energetic Corgi Pup has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: It may waddle a lot, but this Penguin sure is as diligent and affectionate as they come! \n#cSkills: Auto Buff, Meso Magnet, Item Pouch#

string.name: descD
string.value: Your diligent Penguin has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Pirate Parrot

string.name: desc
string.value: The sea-loving Pirate Parrot, friend of pirates and squawker of the seven seas! \n#cSkills: Auto Buff, Meso Magnet, Item Pouch#

string.name: descD
string.value: The sea-loving Pirate Parrot has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Chunky

string.name: desc
string.value: A well-fed raccoon that loves to eat, especially Ramen. \n#cSkill: Automatically uses Buff skill, Meso Magnet, Item Pouch #

string.name: descD
string.value: Your portly Raccoon has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: A colt with wings that thinks its an adventurer. It may be a bit clumsy, but its still kinda cute. \n#cSkill: Automatically uses Buff skill, Meso Magnet, Item Pouch #

string.name: descD
string.value: Your winged Sanchito has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: A spirit of darkness that follows Hilla. A bit arrogant and tends to look down on other people.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your spirit of darkness, Blackheart, has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Metus, a mischievous demon who preys on fear.

string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: desc
string.value: Mos, a melancholy demon who controls death.

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.value: Invidia, a tomboy demon who revels in jealousy.

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: name
string.value: Storm Dragon

string.name: desc
string.value: A great and regal dragon who carries the legendary Dragon Orb.

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: name
string.value: Fennec Fox

string.name: desc
string.value: A romantic fox from the desert. It claims to be from asteroid B-612.

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: desc
string.value: Shark in a bowl. Designed by Cristophery.\r\n #cMesos Pickup Skill learnt#

string.name: descD
string.value: Your cuddly Shark has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Harp Seal

string.name: desc
string.value: A cute and charming Harp Seal. Still just a baby, it's feelings are hurt easily. So you have to take good care of it. \n#cSkill: Automatically uses Buff skill, Meso Magnet, Item Pouch #

string.name: descD
string.value: Your cuddly Harp Seal has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: 마족 메투스

string.name: desc
string.value: 개구쟁이 마족 메투스. 공포를 일으키는 마족이다.\n마족 펫을 장착하면 #c마족의 고귀한 축복 스킬#을 얻게 되며, 장착한 마족 펫의 종류가 많을수록 해당 스킬은 강화된다. \n#c스킬: 자동 버프발동, 메소 줍기, 아이템 줍기 #

string.name: descD
string.value: 사고뭉치 마족이었지만 생명의 물이 모두 말라서 인형의 형태로 돌아갔습니다. 특정한 마법으로 다시 생명을 불어넣어 줄 수 있습니다.

string.name: name
string.value: 마족 모스

string.name: desc
string.value: 암울한 분위기의 마족 모스. 모든 침묵의 수호 마족이다. \n마족 펫을 장착하면 #c마족의 고귀한 축복 스킬#을 얻게 되며, 장착한 마족 펫의 종류가 많을수록 해당 스킬은 강화된다. \n#c스킬: 자동 버프발동, 메소 줍기, 아이템 줍기 #

string.name: descD
string.value: 사고뭉치 마족이었지만 생명의 물이 모두 말라서 인형의 형태로 돌아갔습니다. 특정한 마법으로 다시 생명을 불어넣어 줄 수 있습니다.

string.name: name
string.value: 마족 디아

string.name: desc
string.value: 말괄량이 마족 디아. 마음 속의 질투를 일으키는 마족이다. \n마족 펫을 장착하면 #c마족의 고귀한 축복 스킬#을 얻게 되며, 장착한 마족 펫의 종류가 많을수록 해당 스킬은 강화된다. \n#c스킬: 자동 버프발동, 메소 줍기, 아이템 줍기 #

string.name: descD
string.value: 사고뭉치 마족이었지만 생명의 물이 모두 말라서 인형의 형태로 돌아갔습니다. 특정한 마법으로 다시 생명을 불어넣어 줄 수 있습니다.

string.name: name
string.value: 마족 메투스

string.name: desc
string.value: 개구쟁이 마족 메투스. 공포를 일으키는 마족이다.\n마족 펫을 장착하면 #c마족의 고귀한 축복 스킬#을 얻게 되며, 장착한 마족 펫의 종류가 많을수록 해당 스킬은 강화된다. \n#c스킬: 자동 버프발동, 메소 줍기, 아이템 줍기 #

string.name: descD
string.value: 사고뭉치 마족이었지만 생명의 물이 모두 말라서 인형의 형태로 돌아갔습니다. 특정한 마법으로 다시 생명을 불어넣어 줄 수 있습니다.

string.name: name
string.value: 마족 모스

string.name: desc
string.value: 암울한 분위기의 마족 모스. 모든 침묵의 수호 마족이다. \n마족 펫을 장착하면 #c마족의 고귀한 축복 스킬#을 얻게 되며, 장착한 마족 펫의 종류가 많을수록 해당 스킬은 강화된다. \n#c스킬: 자동 버프발동, 메소 줍기, 아이템 줍기 #

string.value: 마족 디아

string.name: desc
string.value: 말괄량이 마족 디아. 마음 속의 질투를 일으키는 마족이다. \n마족 펫을 장착하면 #c마족의 고귀한 축복 스킬#을 얻게 되며, 장착한 마족 펫의 종류가 많을수록 해당 스킬은 강화된다. \n#c스킬: 자동 버프발동, 메소 줍기, 아이템 줍기 #

string.name: desc
string.value: Metus, a mischievous demon who preys on fear.\nEquip the demon pet to obtain the #cDemon's Noble Blessing Skill#, which will grow in power as you equip more demons.

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: desc
string.value: Mors, the melancholy master of death. \nEquip the demon pet to obtain the #cDemon's Noble Blessing Skill#, which will grow in power as you equip more demons.

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: Penguins are always energetic and in good spirits. Use the Meso Magnet and Item Pouch on the Penguin to pick up the mesos and items on the ground.

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: name
string.value: White Duck

string.name: desc
string.value: Silly and foolish, but hard working and easy-going by nature, White Duck is easy to please, and enjoys good food and a swim.

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: desc
string.value: Bonkey the gorilla acts as helmsman and powder monkey aboard a pirate ship.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your reliable powder monkey/gorilla, Bonkey, has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Harp Seal

string.name: desc
string.value: Cute and cuddly Harp Seal. It's still a baby, so you'll have to take extra care not to hurt its feelings.

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fluffy Puffram with a bright personality and a huggable belly.

string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fluffy Puffram with a bright personality and a huggable belly.

string.value: A fluffy Puffram with a bright personality and a huggable belly.

string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: desc
string.value: A well-fed Bandit that loves to eat, especially Ramen.

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: name
string.value: Silver Husky

string.name: desc
string.value: Active, yet calm at times. Can be moderately fed. Very smart in general.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little Silver Husky, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: name
string.value: Pink Yeti

string.name: desc
string.value: A trustworthy pet that quietly watches everyone's back. Quiet, but smart and gets a lot of things done.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little Mini Pink Yeti, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...
